faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Everything you need to know about biubiu.tools

items.question: What is biubiu.tools?
items.answer: biubiu.tools is a comprehensive Web3 toolkit that provides batch operations and multi-wallet management features for the Ethereum ecosystem.

items.question: Is it safe to use?
items.answer: Yes! We never store your private keys. All operations are performed locally in your browser using secure Web3 protocols.

items.question: Which chains are supported?
items.answer: We support Ethereum mainnet and major EVM-compatible chains including Polygon, BSC, Arbitrum, and Optimism.

items.question: How does batch wallet collection work?
items.answer: Our tool allows you to collect tokens from multiple wallets to a single address in one transaction, saving time and gas fees.

items.question: Can I try it for free?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our free plan includes basic features with up to 10 wallets. You can upgrade anytime for more advanced features.

faqs.contact_text: We're here to help. Reach out to our support team anytime.

referral.benefit_2: When they pay using BiuBiu Tools, you earn 50% commission

referral.note: Note: Once someone uses your referral link, their referral association lasts for 90 days. You'll earn 50% of all their payments during this period.
